text: Deenei laa, tugi dolomeenei gaa hana, deai dahi laagau e looloo be di laagau deenei ai, be e tugi loo i nia gololangi, ma e aha maa gu hagamagalillili humalia. Digaula huogodoo la guu dugu bolo e hai gii mmade gadoo be nia daangada dangada. Guu lawa i di haganoho bolo e dau madalia digau ala e hula gi lala gi tenua o digau mmade.”
